h3.a: OGR6 District Planning & Updates Regarding Coronavirus (COVID19)

p.strong: Welcome To Oak Grove R-VI School District!

p.span: It is the mission of the Oak Grove R-VI School District to create an environment for students to become lifelong learners by providing the guidance, tools, and opportunities to maximize their academic, social, and individual potential.
